      • getRecentCoordinates

        public java.util.ArrayList<double[]> getRecentCoordinates​()
        Returns an ArrayList of the most recent latitudes and longitudes + corresponding bikeID's.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of double[] with the most recent latitudes and longitudes + their corresponding bike_id's.

      • getMostRecentCoordinates

        public java.util.ArrayList<double[]> getMostRecentCoordinates​()
        Retrieves the most recent coordinates of all bikes.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of double[] with the most recent x- and y-coordinate + the corresponding bikeID.

      • getTripNr

        public int getTripNr​(int bikeID)
        Returns the trip number of a given bike.
        Parameters:
        bikeID - the bike_id of the bike that is to be searched for in the database.
        Returns:
        the number of trips that bike has taken.

      • getTotalTrips

        public int getTotalTrips​()
        Returns the total trips of all bikes in the system to be used in the economy part of the statistics.
        Returns:
        the total number of trips.

      • getChargLvl

        public int getChargLvl​(int bikeID)
        Returns the most recent battery percentage of a given bike.
        Parameters:
        bikeID - the bike_id of the bike that is to be searched for.
        Returns:
        the current charg_lvl of that bike.

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance​(int bikeID)

        Returns:

      • getTotalDistance

        public double getTotalDistance​()
        Returns the total distance travelled by all bikes.
        Returns:

      • updateStats

        public boolean updateStats​(java.lang.String time,
                           int bikeID,
                           int chargLvl,
                           double xCord,
                           double yCord,
                           double distance,
                           int tripNr)
        Since all stats are to be saved to the database, this adds new and updated stats to the database.
        Parameters:
        time - when the stats are updated.
        bikeID - which bike the stats are referring to.
        chargLvl - the current charg_lvl of the bike.
        xCord - the current x_cord of the bike.
        yCord - the current y_cord of the bike.
        distance - the total distance the bike has travelled.
        tripNr - how many trips the bike has taken.
        Returns:
        if the update is successful.
